hudson.triggers.TimerTrigger.spec: # 6th of the month. Every other month. Jan Mar May Jul Sep Nov H H 6 1-12 *

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#cd /Library/WebServer/Documents/eol_php_code/update_resources/connectors cd /html/eol_php_code/update_resources/connectors
# php5.6 368.php jenkins #OBSOLETE, use below instead.
# Three (3) connectors to run, one after the other - OK
# OK ##php5.6 pbdb_fresh_harvest.php jenkins #this generates 368.tar.gz
# This will adjust newly generated 368.tar.gz. # It'll remove all Aves descendants as requested. ##php5.6 remove_Aves_children_from_368.php jenkins #this generates 368_removed_aves.tar.gz
# This will remove bad synonyms ##php5.6 synonyms_handling.php jenkins 368_final #this generates 368_final.tar.gz
# 4th step: This will merge 2 occurrences into 1 php5.6 368_merge_two_MoF_into_one.php #this generates 368_merged_MoF.tar.gz
